errors.password2: Password must be at least 12 characters long.
errors.signup: Failed to create account, please try again.
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 12 characters long.
errors.passwordCapital: Password must contain at least one capital letter.
errors.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character.

seedphrase.title: Your secret recovery phrase
seedphrase.subtitle: Write down these 12 words in the correct order and keep them safe. If you lose access to your wallet, you will need these words to recover your funds and data.

warning.label: Warning
warning.message: Do not share this phrase — with anyone.

verify.title: Verify your secret recovery phrase
verify.error: Seed phrase verification failed, please try again.

title.part1: Do you want us to backup your

subtitle.part2: - Helps find your records and transactions on the blockchain faster than scanning.

backup.description: If you choose to backup, the pointers will be encrypted with your viewing key and stored on our database system.  When you recover your Avail wallet like this you instantly get access to all your records and past transaction history.

messages.error: Backup status update failed, please try again.
Failed to authenticate, please try again.

recover.title: Input your secret recovery phrase to recover your wallet.

empty.part2: Tokens will appear here once you receive them.
Transactions will appear here once you execute, send or receive them.

errors.blocks-scan: Failed to scan blocks, please try again.
errors.network: Failed to connect to the network, please check your internet connection.

error.zero-amount: Please enter an amount greater than 0

security.title: Security and Privacy
security.description: At Avail we value our users' privacy and that's why we've taken the measures of security we have when it comes to secure data storage through encryption and seeing that we utilise the best practices in building out our systems to prioritise your privacy and security.

about.title: About Avail
about.description: At Avail our mission is to give anyone frictionless control of their money, data and agreements whilst preserving their privacy.

activity.no_acitvities: No Acitivity yet, get out there and explore!

messages.error: Failed to load activities, please try again.

browser.title: Explore Web3 with Privacy
browser.subtitle: Connect to a dApp to start exploring the decentralized web.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
delete.description: Your key will always exist and be yours, but your account, local key and data will be deleted with this action. To recover your account you must then utilise your secret recovery phrase or private key.

disable-backup.title: Are you sure you want to disable backup ?
disable-backup.description: This will delete your backed up encrypted data and not backup any more of your encrypted data pointers. This means if or when you need to recover your acccount you will not have access to your Aleo data records until the whole blockchain is scanned.

reauth.title: Authenticate Account, then retry action.
reauth.description: This is done to secure your account. Please enter your password to continue.

receive.title: Receive Funds or Data
receive.subtitle: If the counterparty has an Avail account then you can use your username to receive. Otherwise, you can use your address.
receive.qr-description: Scan the QR code for the address.

transfer.title: Confirm this transaction
transfer.subtitle: By confirming the transaction, you will be sending X asset to Y

logout.title: Are you sure you want to log out ?
logout.description: You will need to input your password to log back in.
